name: kitty defense
description:
Place your defenses!

Choose from a scratch post, a stick, a sushi plushie, a tickler, a mouse toy, or an avocado plushie to distract the kittens and prevail.

Once the kittens make it to the fish at the end of their trail of terror, your health bar depletes. Once your health bar has gone to nothing, the kitten invasion has taken hold; you lose!

These kittens are foes from unknown worlds. They have mysterious physical properties where they may go in and out of portals to teleport across the map. So, beware of kitty physics.

Oh, also... beware of the rumored MEGA KITTIES that may appear. They are very hungry... and very angry.

Let me know how you like the game and if you have any ideas you'd like to see added. Here are some planned future features:

  • Tower upgrades
  • Area of Effect towers
  • Flying kittens & anti-air kittens
  • More maps

- jchilly
